description: MCP server for GFW Forest Carbon Gross Removals hosted on WRI CKAN. Exposes tools to inspect CKAN package metadata and download resources.

tools.name: get_package_metadata
tools.description: Return CKAN package_show metadata for the dataset.

tools.name: list_resources
tools.description: List resources (URLs, formats, size) from the CKAN package.

tools.name: download_resource
tools.description: Download a specific resource by resource_id.
